body:
If there's anyone out there with a digital copy of the prequel to this one,
please consider uploading it. (It's '妹といっしょ。- My Sweet Sister - ' - MAPLER/milkberry)

This is the strangest 'lost doujin' experience I have had until now. I read both this one and 
the prequel years ago (around the time they came out) and enjoyed it quite a bit. Then I forgot
about it after which I tried finding it again for years. Somehow it appears as if it was completely
purged from the internet, only to be reappear in its current incomplete form.
